message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I value your offer, $12,000 is my bottom line to make this deal worthwhile. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
